attributes.action: The road outside The Russian Embassy in London be renamed Zelensky Way.
attributes.additional_details: To show this country stands steadfastly with Ukraine and to remind the Russian Embassy and Russian Government in perpetuity of our commitment to freedom around the world.
attributes.background: Following on from the Russian Invasion of Ukraine, the road currently called Kensington Palace Gardens should be renamed Zelensky Way to mark this Governments abhorrence at the Invasion of Ukraine.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road names are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
